post.author: 김세환
post.content:
Mainframe Systems Programmer – Full time


REQUIREMENTS:
Senior level CICS/TS (8+ yrs.) Systems Programmer in an OS/390 environment. Preferences will be given to those with Mainframe Capacity Planning background on OS/390.
Strong statistical analysis, concepts and applications.  


FUNCTIONS:
Installation, implementation and ongoing maintenance of CICS/TS software on Enterprise Servers (OS/390) environments.
Provide technical advice and support on the proper use of software products along with recommendation of new technologies.  
Able to monitor OS/390 resources and make capacity/performance recommendations.

If You are qualified, please contact me at 'kimsw2003@hotmail.com'
post.title: Mainframe Systems Programmer
